text: During charging, the IMD opens the safety circuit and charging is interrupted.\n What is true regarding automatic resume?

answer_options.answer_text: IMD errors are specifically excluded from autoresume
The charger may resume charging if the safety circuit is closed again (i.e. when/if the IMD error goes away)
Automatic error mitigation strategies must be detailed in the FMEA
It is not allowed to automatically resume charging

answers.answer_text: IMD errors are specifically excluded from autoresume
